<item>
           <title>Southern Health accused of "childishness, deceitfulness and lack of accountability" by Connor Sparrowhawk's brother</title>
           
           <link>http://www.oxfordmail.co.uk/news/14490858.Southern_Health_accused_of__quot_childishness__deceitfulness_and_lack_of_accountability_quot__by_Connor_Sparrowhawk__39_s_brother/?ref=rss</link>
           
           
           <description><![CDATA[
  THE brother of an Oxford teenager who died in the care of Southern Health has accused it of "childishness, deceitfulness and a lack of accountability" as pressure grows on its embattled bosses.
]]></description>
           <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 07:05:17 +0100</pubDate>
           <guid isPermaLink="false">c464c55093e770701b5990a11c941118</guid>
    </item>

           <description><![CDATA[
  THE city's students are being asked to donate their unwanted items as they move out at the end of term to help fund research into improving the health of people's hearts.
